thread.title: Arsenal transfer news: Issa Diop scouted by Gunners and Tottenham | Metro News
thread.title_full: Arsenal transfer news: Issa Diop scouted by Gunners and Tottenham | Metro News

author: Tom Olver For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Arsenal transfer news: Issa Diop scouted by Gunners and Tottenham | Metro News
text:
Arsenal and Tottenham scouts watched Issa Diop impress for Toulouse against PSG gossip Tom Olver for Metro.co.uk Monday 20 Feb 2017 12:42 pm Arsenal and Spurs are tracking Issa Diop (Picture: Getty) 
Arsenal and Tottenham had scouts in attendance to watch Issa Diop as Toulouse traveled to Paris Saint-Germain at the weekend. Arsenal star wants to leave club 'at any cost' because of Wenger 
Diop has notched up 43 appearances for Toulouse since making his debut back in 2015 but the 20-year-old has been linked with a move to the Premier League in recent weeks. 
Manchester City are avid admirers of the young centre-back but France Football suggest representatives from Arsenal and Spurs were at the Parc des Princes on Sunday evening. 
It’s understood Arsenal scout – and ex-Gunner – Gilles Grimandi was in the stands as Diop and his Toulouse team-mates came away a point in a 0-0 draw with PSG. Gilles Grimandi now works as a scout for Arsenal in France (Picture: Getty) 
Diop and Co. managed to keep the likes of Edinson Cavani, Julian Draxler and Lucas Moura at bay just days after PSG’s 4-0 thrashing of Barcelona in the Champions League.
